title: Persepsi masyarakat Siwalankerto terhadap program pengabdian masyarakat yang dijalankan melalui program service learning desain rumah sederhana
abstract: This research has been done to know the perception of Siwalankerto's society toward the service-learning program of the moderate house done by UK Petra, especially the Faculty of Interior Design. This research involves explicitly 24 respondents directly. The result of the data is done by using a questionnaire. Moreover, descriptive quantitative statistics show that most respondents state that they agree with every statement in the questionnaire. In conclusion, it can be noted that the perception of Siwalankerto's society toward the service-learning program about the moderate house is positive. The research also considers that Siwalankerto's company is happy with this program and supports it for the next program.
contributors: YULI NUGRAHENI (Advisor 1); Tio Sally Puspasari (Advisor 2); Gatut Priyowidodo (Examination Committee 1)
